hint_key2: Aapko ab yeh change karna hai jisse jab bhi user input ke time par - agar hint likhein, toh aap usse koi bhi ek letter jo abhi tak user ne guess nahi kiya hai, woh letter guess kar kar, accordingly word display kar de.
hint_key3: Hint implement karne ke liye Hint
hint_key4: hint ko aapko valid input mei daalna hoga
hint_key5: Ek aisa function likho jo bacche hue letters (jo abhi tak guess nahi hue hai) unko use kar kar, ek letter select karein aur usse user_input maan kar proceed kar sakte ho
hint_key10: Aap yeh kaam alag tarah se bhi kar sakte hai, yeh sirf ek possible solution hai.
